welcome.text: Welcome to the Adventure! You find yourself at a crossroads in a mysterious forest.

choices.text: Take the path to the left (towards the mountain)
Take the path to the right (towards the village)

fortune.text: You find a mysterious fortune teller's tent...

mountain.text: You climb the mountain path and discover a cave with a glowing crystal inside.

choices.text: Enter the cave and examine the crystal
Roll dice to test your luck before entering

dice_challenge.text: You decide to test your luck with a roll of the dice...

village.text: You arrive at a peaceful village. The villagers welcome you warmly.

crystal.text: The crystal pulses with magical energy. You feel empowered! Your adventure continues...

peak.text: From the peak, you can see the entire realm. What a magnificent view! Your journey ends here.

market.text: The market is bustling with traders. You find rare items and make new friends!

inn.text: You rest well and hear tales of adventure from other travelers. Your story ends here for now.
